name: Explain Complex Code
description: Get a clear explanation of complex or confusing code
message: Explain the currently selected code (or entire file if nothing selected). Provide a high-level overview of what the code does, break down complex logic step-by-step, explain any algorithms used, design patterns, tricky logic, and performance considerations. Identify potential issues or improvements. Use simple language - explain like I'm a junior developer. Add inline comments to clarify confusing parts.
